DOC.brief_summary: Gluteus medius tendinopathy , often refer Greater Trochanteric Pain Syndrome , characterize pain lateral aspect hip aggravate side lying , stair climb , walk . Treatment currently limit lifestyle modification , corticosteroid injection , physical therapy , open endoscopic surgical repair . Platelet rich plasma ( PRP ) injection contain important growth factor essential heal tissue formation process . However , extent PRP efficacious whole blood tendinopathy remain unclear . In double-blind randomized trial , patient allocate receive either PRP whole-blood injection . Post-procedure assessment occur 6 week , 3 month , 6 month , 9 month , 1 year .
